description.paragraph1: Founded in 2015, Addaan International Trading Company (AITC) is a leading provider of mining and exploration solutions in Saudi Arabia. We combine local manufacturing expertise with strong global partnerships to deliver innovative, high-quality products and technical services.
description.paragraph2: We began our journey as the sole agent for Desco rigs in 2017, supplying reliable and advanced drilling equipment. In 2019, we expanded our portfolio by becoming a trusted distributor of
description.paragraph3: IMDEX — a global leader in drilling fluids, downhole tools, and data solutions. Between 2020 and 2021, we pioneered the launch of locally manufactured core trays, proudly approved by Ma’aden, reflecting our commitment to Saudi Vision 2030 and local content development. Most recently, in 2025, AITC partnered with CR Mining to provide high-performance GET, cast lips, and digital solutions, further strengthening Saudi Arabia’s mining sector.
description.paragraph4: Through strong collaborations with industry leaders such as Ma’aden and SGS, we continue to drive sustainable growth, operational excellence, and reliability across mining operations.

2022.description: Achieved sales of more than 200,000 core trays nationwide, while focusing on product enhancements and raw material development.

2023.title: Record-Breaking Year
2023.description: Celebrated the company's most successful year, setting new records in growth, client satisfaction, and industry impact.

2024.title: The Bronze Year
2024.description: Surpassed 250,000 core boxes sold. Established Saudi Arabia's first IMDEX repair centre, enhancing service efficiency and strengthening client relationships.

2025.title: The Silver Year
2025.description: Continuing a legacy of innovation and excellence with anticipated achievements in technology and market expansion.

heading.label: AITC Core Trays
heading.title: Saudi-Made Excellence - Locally manufactured in our state-of-the-art Rabigh facility • Supporting Vision 2030

hero.title: AITC CORE TRAYS – OEM Saudi Manufacturer
hero.subtitle: Engineered for Harsh Conditions | Made in Saudi Arabia | OEM Excellence

intro.heading: Saudi Arabia's Premier Core Tray Solution
intro.paragraph1: As the original equipment manufacturer (OEM), Addaan International Trading Company (AITC) proudly produces high-quality core trays built to perform in the most demanding field conditions.
intro.paragraph2: Manufactured at our Rabigh facility using 100% locally sourced raw materials, our trays are a cornerstone of Saudi Vision 2030 — delivering durability, efficiency, and sustainability.
intro.industryFirst: Designed in late 2020 and launched into full production in 2021, AITC Core Trays represent Saudi Arabia's first locally engineered and manufactured solution for reliable core sample handling.
intro.altText: AITC Core Trays in a field setting

features.heading: Key Features of AITC Core Trays

uv.title: UV-Stabilized Polypropylene
uv.text: Manufactured with highly UV-resistant material ensuring long-lasting outdoor performance.

complete.title: Complete Tray Set
complete.text: A secure-fitting universal lid (PQ/HQ/NQ) and 5 easy-to-label separators for accurate core sectioning.

support.title: Core Support & Orientation
support.text: Ribbed channels to stabilize core samples during transit; optional drain plugs to retain fines and fluids; wide channel dividers and note space for field annotations.

safety.title: Handling & Safety
safety.text: Ergonomic side handles, rounded edges for injury prevention, one-piece design that's easy to carry, lock, and secure; compatible with padlocks or cable ties.

stackable.title: Stackable & Transport-Ready
stackable.text: Trays lock securely when stacked; flat base designed for smooth movement on conveyors or benches; stack height: 40 mm (50 trays = 2 meters high).

covers.title: Core Tray Covers
covers.items:
Universal lids that securely fit PQ, HQ, and NQ trays
UV-resistant and field-proven
Easy to lock and transport
One-size-fits-all design

runMarkers.title: Run Markers
runMarkers.items:
Smooth-fitting markers designed to sit perfectly in the tray grooves
Available in PQ, HQ, and NQ sizes
Ideal for section marking and core logging

rcChip.title: RC Chip Trays
rcChip.items:
Durable trays for RC cuttings – ready for field and lab use
Standard 20/40 Compartment
Lightweight and stackable
Clearly labeled for efficient sample handling
